name: Pro Mahjong Tsuwamono Series: Joryuu Janshi ni Chousen: Watashi-tachi ni Chousen Shite ne!
overview: Pro Mahjong Tsuwamono Series - Joryuu Janshi ni Chousen is a mahjong game in which the player can choose at the beginning to be a male or a female character and play againts 3 female opponents. There are 6 female characters avaliable, 2 different boards & 3 different colour pieces.
